coffees.title: Vampire's Kiss
coffees.description: A dark roast with hints of cherry and blood orange, finished with a crimson foam that resembles the kiss of a vampire. Our signature drink that started it all.

coffees.title: Dracula's Brew
coffees.description: Inspired by the Count himself, this Romanian bean blend has notes of dark chocolate and blackberry with a mysterious smoky finish.

coffees.title: Midnight Elixir
coffees.description: A potent cold brew that will keep you awake through the darkest nights. Brewed for 13 hours under a full moon for maximum potency.

coffees.title: Blood Moon Blend
coffees.description: Only available during lunar events, this special blend incorporates rare Indonesian beans with a hint of pomegranate.

coffees.title: Transylvanian Mocha
coffees.description: A rich chocolate-coffee hybrid with Romanian cocoa and a dash of cinnamon to ward off... well, you know.

coffees.title: Nightshade Latte
coffees.description: A dangerously smooth latte with vanilla and just a hint of licorice root. Perfect for midnight rendezvous.

coffees.title: Crimson Cappuccino
coffees.description: Our classic cappuccino with a bloody twist - beetroot powder gives it that signature crimson hue.

coffees.title: Bat Wing Brew
coffees.description: Don't worry, no bats were harmed - this dark, mysterious blend gets its name from the wing-shaped cinnamon art on top.

coffees.title: Eternal Darkness
coffees.description: For those who truly embrace the night - a quadruple espresso with activated charcoal for that pitch-black color.
